mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( m_email, m_pw, m_name, m_profile_img, m_nick, m_phone, m_regdate, m_logtype, m_admintype, m_is_maintain, m_retention_period, m_birth ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{profileImg}, #{nick}, #{phone}, NOW(), 0, #{admintype}, #{isMaintain}, #{retentionPeriod}, DATE_FORMAT(#{birth}, '%Y-%m-%d') )
INSERT INTO ADDRESS ( m_id, a_zipcode, a_addr1, a_addr2 ) VALUES ( #{mId}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2} )
mapper.select: SELECT m_id AS mId, m_email AS email, m_pw AS pw, m_name AS name, m_profile_img AS profileImg, m_nick AS nick, m_phone AS phone, m_regdate AS regdate, m_logtype AS logtype, m_admintype AS admintype, m_is_maintain AS isMaintain, m_retention_period AS retentionPeriod, m_birth as birth, m_gender as gender FROM MEMBER WHERE m_email = #{email} AND m_pw = #{pw}
